paragraphs.name: ea7e
paragraphs.text: My Dearest Mark

paragraphs.name: 3fcc
paragraphs.text: I love you more! Our teamwork efforts, along with our followers is what tells this story in a short, simple way. We are all excited to see this great accomplishment . You are my rock as well as I am yours! Thanks also to you Kevin for all of your nice words.

paragraphs.name: 938f
paragraphs.text: You are so welcome!

paragraphs.name: e7ef
paragraphs.text: I don’t know my next step with this publication. I’m going to continue to run contests and hopefully if we can garner more sponsor start rewarding writers for posting on a continuing basis. I feel it’s only fair.

paragraphs.name: 8a3b
paragraphs.text: I’ve also been thinking of trying to come up with a way to help kids get…

paragraphs.name: ec82
paragraphs.text: Congratulations! That is excellent news, and it is only the beginning. Remember, many companies started in the garage and today are billion dollar empires. I see great things for your publication, great things.

paragraphs.name: 7e7b
paragraphs.text: Thank you Kevin,

paragraphs.name: 49ff
paragraphs.text: When I started this publication it was kind of a joke. I started a community on G+ under the title Imperfect Writers of G+ to help people publish their posts. Then I decided to try it here.

paragraphs.name: a14e
paragraphs.text: It started slow and over the past few months things have changed.

paragraphs.name: 1d81
paragraphs.text: Thank you for finding us and supporting us.

paragraphs.text: Hi Mary,

paragraphs.name: 75ec
paragraphs.text: Thank you. It’s amazing how this is turning out. I remember when some people at Medium were against this publication. Now things are looking great. At least to me!

paragraphs.name: bf4a
paragraphs.text: Congratulations! This is awesome!

content.subtitle: You will do well as your heart is in the right place. The one thing you have to remember is that this is a marathon, not a race. Take it…

paragraphs.text: You are more than welcome and I am happy to support you and your cause. I have also ran a G+ site for a few years and decided it was time to step it up. As long as I have breath in me I will help support publications like yours and authors to increase their readership and grow.
